CustomField.description: The ‘revenue start date’ is the date the customer is first invoiced for services provided to them. Please factor into the ‘start date’ any on-boarding and implementation time required for the product or service.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The ‘revenue start date’ is the date the customer is first invoiced for services provided to them. Please factor into the ‘start date’ any on-boarding and implementation time required for the product or service.
CustomField.label: Revenue Start Date
